TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISendMessageCallback

summary.span: 实现一个回调的接口，该回调将在 或 活动在网络上发送消息之前调用。

span.span: An interface that implements a callback that is called just before a message is sent on the wire by the or activities.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现消息在网络上发送之前访问消息新标头的接口。The following example shows how to implement the interface to a new header to a message before it is sent out on the wire. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSendMessage(class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext operationContext) cil managed

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 发送消息时所在的操作上下文。

span.span: The operation’s context under which the message is being sent.
Executed when a service message is sent.
